XPSPL - PHP Signal Processing Library¶

XPSPL is a high performance signal processor for the PHP programming language.

Table of Contents¶

  • Installing XPSPL
    • Requirements
    • Install
    • Updates
    • Windows
  • Configuration

Modules¶

  • FTP Module

Source¶

XPSPL is hosted on Github.

Performance¶

The following performance tests were generated on a 2.7GHZ i5 processor using this script.

Note

These tests were performed under the event_removal branch.

Author¶

XPSPL has been designed and developed by Nickolas C. Whiting.

Version¶

XPSPL is currently in major version 3.

There is no current minor or bugfix release.

Support¶

Support for XPSPL is offered through two support channels.

Mailing list¶

A mailing list provided by Google Groups.

IRC¶

An IRC channel by irc.freenode.net #prggmr.
